record.field: [commown] Automatic account payment on contract driven transaction

invoice = env['account.invoice'].search([('number', '=', object.reference)])
if (invoice and invoice.contract_id and invoice.contract_id.payment_mode_id):
contract = invoice.contract_id
payment = env['account.payment'].create({ 'company_id': 1, # ourselves! 'partner_id': contract.partner_id.id, 'partner_type': 'customer', 'state': 'draft', 'payment_type': 'inbound', 'journal_id': contract.payment_mode_id.fixed_journal_id.id, 'payment_method_id': contract.payment_mode_id.payment_method_id.id, 'amount': object.amount, 'payment_transaction_id': object.id, 'invoice_ids': [(6, 0, [invoice.id])], })
payment.post()
